entry.title: The Ship and the Canal

by dandelionbunny

"The Ship and the Canal" (די שיפ און דער קאנאל)
A femlash fic (originally written in Yiddish) starring the Ever Given Container Ship and the Suez Canal.

Full credits go to the original author for this beautiful story. This translation is not direct. It takes some liberties where I believe the direct translation would be either confusing or stylistically questionable.

entry.title: Evergiving
entry.summary:
by Anonymous

"She’s not paying much attention to the ship that passes on her waters, no different from the hundreds that went before – at least until it takes an abrupt, hard turn to the right and collides at top speed with the wall. "

It turns out five days and an international crisis is all it takes to fall in love.
